testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when body is empty

testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when username is empty

testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when password is empty

testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when credentials are not valid..
testcase.name: should response UnAuthorized & return a error response
testcase.failure: Error: timeout of 10000ms exceeded at null.<anonymous> (/tmp/nodejs-authentication-api/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:157:19) at Timer.listOnTimeout (timers.js:110:15)

testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when user is not registered yet..
testcase.name: should response Not found & return a error response

testcase.classname: Account Authentication Service POST /accounts/authenticate Check response when user is authenticated correctly.
testcase.name: should response UnAuthorized & return account details

testcase.classname: Account Creation Service POST /accounts Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when fullName is empty

testcase.classname: Account Creation Service POST /accounts Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when username is empty

testcase.classname: Account Creation Service POST /accounts Check response when some required fields are not sent.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when username & password are empty

testcase.classname: Account Creation Service POST /accounts Check response when even though the required fields are sent, they have some invalid format.
testcase.name: should response BAD REQUEST & the error details when username is not a valid email

testcase.classname: Account Creation Service POST /accounts Check response when account is created successfully.
testcase.name: should response CREATED & return a valid response

testcase.classname: Status Service GET /monitor/status - Test Server status Check http status code & body response
testcase.name: should response 200 and all the services should be running
